dspace-development.title: Provide the file system export for Symplectic Elements QA environment

comments.body:
I am still looking for a solution to this, but the current blocking problem is that the size of the `Elements` directory exceeds what can be readily transferred over the network:

![image.png](https://images.zenhubusercontent.com/5b5b6aed981c3204c9ed06c8/c2effba9-5477-4fea-a94d-8029ed2c2551)

I have been progressing with the directory transfer (as well as ensuring that there is a local copy of the files being transferred). Unfortunately, this is still a somewhat slow process due to network latency restrictions:

![image.png](https://images.zenhubusercontent.com/5b5b6aed981c3204c9ed06c8/c3f01ab2-b087-4721-b7b6-ac793aaf138e)

figgy.title: Migrate legacy images from libimages to libimages2 and migrate off libimages

comments.body: njmaps is updated. All we have to do now is change the alias for libimages.princeton.edu from libserv19 to lib-adc.
Done!!

DLS discussion on 03/22: We'd like to get this done at some point in the relatively near future just so folks don't upload this kind of content to DSpace or (especially) DSS, in alignment with the policy: (https://lib-confluence.princeton.edu/display/COM/Linking+External+Documents+to+Catalog+Records+and+Finding+Aids). That being said it's probably best resolved as "make people's lives better ticket" - nobody's work is being halted here and we have a lot of important sudden priority and maintenance tickets to get through.

We need one for this cycle, so I'll put it in this cycle. When Kim's back if she has a better candidate for the slot for this cycle we can do that.

Completed along with https://github.com/pulibrary/princeton_ansible/pull/2869

Deployed.

pdc_describe.title: Integrate accessibility audits into automated builds
DataCite - Using an existing ARK updates the ezid metadata
Dublin Core - Using an existing ARK
A user can log in via Princeton CAS
An ARK is minted for each newly created object

comments.body:
I recommend using the [EZID Client gem](https://github.com/duke-libraries/ezid-client) which is also used by Figgy ([example](https://github.com/pulibrary/figgy/blob/0b9bcfddd1d96c6bf669d7468a15f2291ba7f8b2/app/services/identifier_service.rb)).

EZID has a default username, password, and shoulder setting to allow the use of the EZID test service.  Test arks begin with ark:/99999/fk4 and persist in the service for 2 weeks before EZID gets rid of them.

[Example client with and without test configuration](https://github.com/pulibrary/figgy/blob/c5f851aea6e7c65306e17fb40ec9cf74c40a0a7f/config/initializers/ezid.rb)

pdc_discovery.title: Background Image Renders Strange Blue in Safari
Removed blue gradient visible in Safari
Adds link to uptime page in README
Disable Blacklight's autocomplete suggester since we don't have it co…

comments.body:
This is how it looked when the suggest was enabled

![suggest](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/568286/159523568-58a75703-5a97-471d-ae74-a3d1c0905bbf.png)

I put my notes on Globus on this Google Doc https://docs.google.com/document/d/1d8u3KhsoX-x3k59GgWfhC7325R6616j8RytccTelPWM/edit#

Notice that it includes information about Globus in general, transfers with Globus Connect Personal, and via the Command Line Interface but not with the API.

## Screenshots from audit:

### Small desktop device screen (1024px wide)
![small_screen_1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7795797/159569426-bf63a698-b8a7-4e74-af96-f971816f75e1.png)
![small_screen_2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7795797/159569473-2f49af5a-94e5-4a2b-9322-651338f0ffbd.png)

--- 

### Tablet (860px wide)
![ipad_1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7795797/159569531-d34af259-b040-4915-af02-a51f3cfaa668.png)

![ipad_2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7795797/159569553-c57599e0-eaaa-4797-9614-26ffae71bf17.png)

---

### Mini tablet (736px wide) 
![ipad_mini_1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7795797/159569656-9dea1113-0a72-47e2-8527-06557a800c9e.png)

![ipad_mini_2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7795797/159569666-eed2624d-e1c0-4709-b802-4302eb8fce7f.png)

---

### Mobile device (375px wide)
![phone_1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7795797/159569777-6f72021d-caae-4be2-bc08-6329208c96f8.png)

![phone_2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7795797/159569793-772d6ac0-8af0-4ffc-9b71-8c2425b5216b.png)

![phone_3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7795797/159569804-e4cc73ed-c64d-42df-908b-afecbc30e796.png)

Recommendation for first-pass responsive improvements --

* For 860px and lower breakpoints
  * Scale down typography using rem measurements
  * Scale down padding on "welcome" banner (blue banner at top)
* For 736ox and lower breakpoints
  * Hide Blacklight "limit search" controls
  * Main menu items should be horizontally aligned in a single row under the logo
  * Search bar renders under the main navigation
  * Show page right sidebar renders underneath the record metadata (bottom of the page)
* For 375px and lower breakpoints
  * Render mobile-friendly version of the logo

## Mockups:
### Front page 
![phone_mockup](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7795797/159570764-295d42c0-813c-49e6-a7d6-db12bbc6b068.png)

### Show page
#### Top
![mobile_mockup_show](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7795797/159570805-f461e058-02bc-45af-a7e0-12f505df896f.png)
#### Bottom
![mockup_bottom](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7795797/159570809-0249b02d-7565-427a-888a-9e8968341309.png)

### Static page
![mobile_mockup_static](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7795797/159570924-d47ad865-55a2-4167-b796-09f2a5f7699a.png)
